column4: hi could someone help me to change my mouse speed settings permanently in Ubuntu.  I am using the LXDE desktop and the only way I can change it is with xset in the terminal.  But I have to do that each team I log in.
the only way I know how is to make a script, then make a .desktop file to run it in ~/.config/autostart
if there is a script which gets ran when LXDE or openbox runs, add it there
